title: texlive $PATH broken
body:
It seems the binaries do not go into $PREFIX/bin but rather $PREFIX\x86_64-linux\bin which isn't added to $PATH

```
[root@server ~]# tree /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/texlive-live-3vtoh4h7hgxqhntdc6t5e3tsfsgmtd7e/bin/ | head
/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/texlive-live-3vtoh4h7hgxqhntdc6t5e3tsfsgmtd7e/bin/
└── x86_64-linux
    ├── afm2tfm
    ├── allcm -> ../../texmf-dist/scripts/texlive/allcm.sh
    ├── allec -> allcm
    ├── allneeded -> ../../texmf-dist/scripts/texlive/allneeded.sh

```

```
[root@server ~]# module show texlive-live-gcc-6.3.0-3vtoh4h
-------------------------------------------------------------------
/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/share/spack/modules/linux-centos7-x86_64/texlive-live-gcc-6.3.0-3vtoh4h:

module-whatis    texlive @live 
prepend-path     PATH /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/texlive-live-3vtoh4h7hgxqhntdc6t5e3tsfsgmtd7e/bin 
prepend-path     CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/texlive-live-3vtoh4h7hgxqhntdc6t5e3tsfsgmtd7e/ 
```


```
[root@server spack]# git log | head
commit b1861b29efe929c81aacbf8848ddd7d309c00e18
Author: becker33 <becker33@llnl.gov>
Date:   Tue Jun 27 12:27:16 2017 -0700

    Added install option to read spec from file (#4611)
```

Anyone fixed yet?
